articles.content: On November 18, the research work of Dr Thirumala Devi Kanneganti, vice-chair of St Jude Immunology has been published in the peer-reviewed prestigious journal Cell. She completed her Master's degree… [+1712 chars]

articles.title: Telangana-born Dr. Thirumala Devi discovers possible COVID-19 treatment - Telugu News - IndiaGlitz.com
articles.description: Telangana-born researcher Dr. Thirumala-Devi Kanneganti is in the news for finding a way to prevent covid-induced deaths.
